resources.name: Login
resources.description:
This will be the path to log in 

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|identifier|User identifier|
|Password|Password of the user to log in|


```response:404
  {
    "message": "User not found"
  }
```

To log in you need the token and the id of the user or administrator, if they are valid the system will return the message 200.

```response:200
{
	"message": "User found", 
	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI2MThiMzM1Y2JjNDkyYmMzNzc2NzE0OTUiLCJpYXQiOjE2MzY1MTI2MzYsImV4cCI6MTYzNzcyMjIzNn0.7psqteblG8yFlyyZiVwugiv8Ej_t1lJWtQb52yb2RVc"
}
```

resources.name: Oauth2 Callback
resources.description:
This will be the path to log in 

|Parameter| Description|
|---------|-------------|
|id token|Token ID sent from Google Auth API|

To log in you need the token and the id of the user or administrator, if they are valid the system will return the message 200.

```response:200
{
	"message": "User found", 
	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI2MThiMzM1Y2JjNDkyYmMzNzc2NzE0OTUiLCJpYXQiOjE2MzY1MTI2MzYsImV4cCI6MTYzNzcyMjIzNn0.7psqteblG8yFlyyZiVwugiv8Ej_t1lJWtQb52yb2RVc"
}
```


```response:201
{
	"message": "User created", 
	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJfaWQiOiI2MThiMzM1Y2JjNDkyYmMzNzc2NzE0OTUiLCJpYXQiOjE2MzY1MTI2MzYsImV4cCI6MTYzNzcyMjIzNn0.7psqteblG8yFlyyZiVwugiv8Ej_t1lJWtQb52yb2RVc"
}
```

resources.name: Add event img
Change event img
Switch event state
Update Event
resources.description:
> Permiso necesario: eventmod

| Parameter | Description |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event_id | The unique key that identifies each event.                                                           |
| event_date/time | The date/time the event will take place.                                                   |
| Number of tickets for the event | The number of tickets available for the event.                                                   |
| Promoter | The promoter in charge of the event.                                                                    |
| Duration | The estimated duration of the event in minutes.                                                          |
| location_id | The foreign key to the location where the event will take place.                                  |
| Category | The category of the event.                                                                             |
| Status | The current status of the event, it can be active if tickets are being sold for this event; suspended or terminated. |
| Total Attendees | The total number of users who purchased a ticket for the event.                             |

Update a event with the especified data
```response:200
{
  "message": "Event Updated"
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message": "Event not found"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

```response:400
{
  "message": "Some error from validations"
}
```

resources.name: Create Event
resources.description:
> Permiso necesario: eventmod

| Parameter | Description |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event_id | The unique key that identifies each event.                                                           |
| event_date/time | The date/time the event will take place.                                                   |
| Number of tickets for the event | The number of tickets available for the event.                                                   |
| Promoter | The promoter in charge of the event.                                                                    |
| Duration | The estimated duration of the event in minutes.                                                          |
| Locality_id | The foreign key to the location where the event will take place.                                  |
| Category | The category of the event.                                                                             |
| Status | The current status of the event, it can be active if tickets are being sold for this event; suspended or terminated. |
| Total Attendees | The total number of users who purchased a ticket for the event.                             |

Data sent from the event manager interface in order to create a new event and show it on the billboard    

```response:200
{
  "message": "Event Created"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```
```response:401
{
  "message": "Some error from validations"
}
```

resources.name: Board Events
resources.description:
> No query or auth needed 

| Attribute | Description |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event_id | The unique key that identifies each event.                                                           |
| code | The unique key that group many events.                                                           |
| event_date/time | The date/time the event will take place.                                                   |
| Number of tickets for the event | The number of tickets available for the event.                                                   |
| Promoter | The promoter in charge of the event.                                                                    |
| Duration | The estimated duration of the event in minutes.                                                          |
| category_id | The foreign key to the location where the event will take place.                                  |
| Category | The category of the event.                                                                             |
| Status | The current status of the event, it can be active if tickets are being sold for this event; suspended or terminated. |
| Total Attendees | The total number of users who purchased a ticket for the event.                             |

resources.name: Edit tier
resources.description:
> Permiso necesario: eventmod

Parametro|Descripción
---|---
tier_id|Llave foránea hacia el tier al que se va a editar

Atributo|Descripción
---|---
event_id|Llave foránea hacia el evento que genera esta cotización
numered|Indica si el bloque de asiento es numerado o no
request_name|Nombre del bloque de asiento según lo decida el promotor del evento
price|Precio específico del bloque de asiento según lo haya establecido el promotor del evento
location_id|Identificador de la localidad en la que se encuentra el bloque de asientos

Use this route to send the tiers info while creating events 


```response:200
{
  "message": "tier updated"
}
```

```response:404
{
  "message": "tier not found"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

```response:400
{
  "message": "no id"
}
```

resources.name: Sold seats
Tickets by event
resources.description:
| parametro | Descripción |
| -------- | ----------- |
| event_id | Identificador único del evento |

| Atributo | Descripción |
| -------- | ----------- |
| ticket_id | Identificador único del ticket |
| purcharse_id | Identificador de la compra a la que pertenece el ticket |
| event_id | Identificador del evento al que corresponde el ticket |
| seat | Número del asiento en el evento. Tendrá el formato "[NombreBloque]-[numero]" o "[NombreBloque]" en caso de que los asientos no sean numerados |
| state | Estado del ticket: puede estar canjeado o sin canjear. Por defecto, estará sin canjear hasta que un empleado escanee este ticket |
| tier_id | Identificador de la localidad en la que se encuentra el evento |

resources.name: Events to validate
resources.description:
> Permiso necesario: validator

If the user has the "validator" permission, will receive the events for which he/she is contracted.


| Attribute | Description |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event_id | The unique key that identifies each event.                                                           |
| code | The unique key that group many events.                                                           |
| event_date/time | The date/time the event will take place.                                                   |
| Number of tickets for the event | The number of tickets available for the event.                                                   |
| Promoter | The promoter in charge of the event.                                                                    |
| Duration | The estimated duration of the event in minutes.                                                          |
| Locality_id | The foreign key to the location where the event will take place.                                  |
| Category | The category of the event.                                                                             |
| Status | The current status of the event, it can be active if tickets are being sold for this event; suspended or terminated. |
| Total Attendees | The total number of users who purchased a ticket for the event.                             |

```response:200

{
	"events": [
	{
		"event_id": "1",
		"event_date/time": "2023-06-15 20:00:00",
		"event_tickets_quantity": "500",
		"promoter": "Live Nation",
		"Duration": 180,
		"Location_id": 12345,
		"Category": "Concert",
		"Status": "active",
		"Total Attendees": 250
	},
	{
		"event_id": "2",
		"event_date/time": "2023-06-18 19:30:00",
		"Number of tickets for the event": 300,
		"promoter": "Ticketmaster",
		"Duration": 120,
		"Location_id": 56789,
		"Category": "Play",
		"Status": "completed",
		"Total Attendees": 275
	}
]}

```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

resources.name: Validated tickets
resources.description:
> Permiso necesario: validator


The validator can get the tickets validated vs tickets selled

| Atributo   | Descripción                                                                 |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ticket selled     | Gotten info from tickets´s table of all ticket selled                           |
| tickets validated  | Gotten info from ticket´s table of all tickets validated                |




> Permiso necesario: validator

```response:200
{
	"ticket_selled": 98,
	"ticket_validated": 15
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

resources.name: Validate ticket
resources.description:
> Permiso necesario: validator

Enviado por query
| Parameter   | Descripción                                                                 |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event_id     | Gotten info from tickets´s table of all ticket selled                           |
| ticket_id     | Gotten info from tickets´s table of all ticket selled                           |

Enviado por body
| Atributo   | Descripción                                                                 |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| ticket hash     | Gotten info from tickets´s table of all ticket selled                           |

```response:200
{
	"message": "ticket validated"
}
```

```response:400
{
  "message": "no valid hash"
}
```

```response:400
{
  "message": "Some errors from validations"
}
```

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

resources.name: Verify User
Update Password
Account Data
resources.description:
## Entidad de Usuario

| Atributo   | Descripción                                                                 |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Nombre     | El nombre del usuario registrado en la plataforma                           |
| Apellidos  | Los apellidos del usuario registrado en la plataforma                       |
| Email      | La dirección de correo electrónico del usuario registrado en la plataforma |
| Verificado | Indica si el usuario ha verificado su cuenta a través de correo electrónico. |

Tabla permisos 
| Atributo   | Descripción                                                                 |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| id_permisos     | El nombre del usuario registrado en la plataforma                           |
| permiso  | Los apellidos del usuario registrado en la plataforma                       |


```response:200
{
	"nombre": "Juan",
	"apellidos": "Pérez Sánchez",
	"email": "juanperez@gmail.com",
	"verificado": true,
	"permisos": [
		{
			"id_permiso": "BUY_AUTH",
			"permisos": "buy"
		},
		{
			"id_permiso": "BUY_AUTH",
			"permisos": "buy"
		},
		{
			"id_permiso": "BUY_AUTH",
			"permisos": "buy"
		}
	]
}
```


```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

resources.name: All Users
resources.description:
Gracias por la información adicional. A continuación, proporciono los documentos Markdown actualizados con los detalles que me ha brindado:

## Entidad de Usuario

| Atributo   | Descripción                                                                 |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Nombre     | El nombre del usuario registrado en la plataforma                           |
| Apellidos  | Los apellidos del usuario registrado en la plataforma                       |
| Email      | La dirección de correo electrónico del usuario registrado en la plataforma |
| Token      | El token generado por OAuth utilizado para autenticar la cuenta de usuario en la plataforma |
| Verificado | Indica si el usuario ha verificado su cuenta a través de correo electrónico. |

### Posibles respuestas

#### Respuesta exitosa (200)

```response:200
{
  "nombre": "Juan",
  "apellidos": "Pérez Sánchez",
  "email": "juanperez@gmail.com",
  "contraseña": "********",
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9",
  "verificado": true
}
```

#### Error de autenticación (401)

```response:401
{
  "message": "Unauthorized"
}
```

resources.name: All Events
resources.description:
> DATA PERMISSION 

| Attribute | Description |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| event_id | The unique key that identifies each event.                                                           |
| code | The unique key that group many events.                                                           |
| event_date/time | The date/time the event will take place.                                                   |
| Number of tickets for the event | The number of tickets available for the event.                                                   |
| Promoter | The promoter in charge of the event.                                                                    |
| Duration | The estimated duration of the event in minutes.                                                          |
| location_id | The foreign key to the location where the event will take place.                                  |
| category_id | The category of the event.                                                                             |
| Status | The current status of the event, it can be active if tickets are being sold for this event; suspended or terminated. |
| Total Attendees | The total number of users who purchased a ticket for the event.                             |
